properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Tennessee River at Johnsonville.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tennessee River at Johnsonville
* from Friday February 14 until further notice.
* At 4 PM Wednesday the stage was...360.3 feet and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 362.4 feet on Wednesday February 19.
* Flood stage is 361.5 feet.
* At 361.5 feet...Low-lying portions of Old Johnsonville Road near
the Battle of Johnsonville Park begin to flood, and water
approaches some of the parking areas and campgrounds at Mason's
Boat Dock near Waverly.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
